solution.linktext: Ensure a smooth Azure deployment with personalized architecture design and deployment guidance from a Microsoft expert.
Working on an Azure deal? Get assistance with cost estimating, POC/value proposition and architecture planning.
Get the help you need to start a new cloud practice or expand to new Azure workloads during this one-on-one consultation.
Using Technical Presales Assistance and partner advisory hours

community.linktext: Get help from the Microsoft Partner Support Community
Read the Partner Technical Services blog
Subscribe to the MPN Partner Support YouTube Channel

submission.title: Submit a request online
submission.description: Submit the details of your request online, and a Microsoft partner consultant will contact you with customized guidance to meet your business needs.

call.title: Call an agent
call.description: Speak to a Regional Service Center agent by phone.
